QuestData.Title: Meet with Thega Graveblade
QuestData.Description: Thega Graveblade, the senior rogue trainer of the Shattered Hand in Orgrimmar, wishes to meet with you. Make your way to Orgrimmar quickly, $n and seek her out at The Barracks in the Valley of Honor. She must have an important mission for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Thega Graveblade at The Barracks in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Thega Graveblade at The Barracks in Orgrimmar.
